title: Mikrotik WInbox Integration BUG
author: Galandrix
body_snippet:
Hello, could you please fix winbox integration? When i start winbox, gray window is apear.

comments.snippet: I have tested on mRemoteNG 1.78.2 NB 3228 - still exist, but where to find - fork v1.79.x or upstream dev?
comments.author: Galandrix

comments.snippet:
Thanks for testing! The fork releases are available here:
- **v1.80.0** (latest): https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/v1.80.0
- **v1.79.0**: https://github.com/robertpopa22/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/v1.79.0

v1.80.0 also includes self-contained builds (no .NET runtime needed). Please test with the v1.80.0 build and let us know if the Winbox integration issue persists there as well.
